resources.string: I need some permissions to run. Please click the green button to grant them. You can click on the \"Why?\" button for the reason why I need those.
You need to grant me permissions to continue.
And finally I need a name for your phone of your choosing, so macOS knows who it is talking to.
Welcome to the first time setup of TetheringHelper!
TetheringHelper needs to figure out how good the signal quality to your phone carrier is. To do this it needs the permission to make and manage phone calls.
TetheringHelper is enabled and will activate itself when you enable your hotspot.
TetheringHelper is disabled and will never run.
